text:
Bong Joon-ho clearly trusts his audience. Having just seen Train to Busan last year, his development from even then to now is clear. He doesn't bother with excess. And Parasite is so well trimmed.

But here we have just a little fat, a chewy piece on an otherwise perfect steak.
